TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SessionStateStoreProviderBase extends System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase
Public MustInherit Class SessionStateStoreProviderBase Inherits ProviderBase

summary.span: 定义数据存储区的会话状态提供程序所需的成员。

span.span: Defines the required members of a session-state provider for a data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 会话状态读取和写入会话数据从 / 向数据存储区使用会话状态存储提供程序。ASP.NET session state reads and writes session data from and to a data store using a session-state store provider. 会话状态存储提供程序是继承的类抽象类，并重写其成员实现特定于数据存储。A session-state store provider is a class that inherits the abstract class and overrides its members with implementations specific to the data store. 会话状态存储提供程序由调用类在 ASP.NET 页面与存储的数据存储进行通信的处理和检索会话变量和相关的会话信息，例如超时值的过程。The session-state store provider is called by the class during the processing of an ASP.NET page to communicate with the data store for the storage and retrieval of session variables and related session information such as the time-out value. 每个 ASP.NET 应用程序中的会话数据为每个单独存储属性。Session data within each ASP.NET application is stored separately for each property. ASP.NET 应用程序不共享会话数据。ASP.NET applications do not share session data. 可以指定自定义通过设置为 ASP.NET 应用程序的实现`mode`的属性`sessionState`到的配置元素和`customProvider`作为属性的自定义提供程序名称本主题的示例中所示。You can specify a custom implementation for an ASP.NET application by setting the `mode` attribute of the `sessionState` configuration element to and the `customProvider` attribute to the name of the custom provider, as shown in the example for this topic. ## 锁定会话存储数据Locking Session Store Data 由于 ASP.NET 应用程序是多线程来支持对并发请求的响应，就可以并发请求可能会尝试访问相同的会话信息。Because ASP.NET applications are multithreaded to support responding to concurrent requests, it is possible that concurrent requests might attempt to access the same session information. 假设所有框架集的多个框架访问同一个应用程序的位置。Consider a scenario where multiple frames in a frameset all access the same application. 可以同时在不同的线程上的 Web 服务器上执行框架集中每个帧的独立请求。The separate requests for each frame in the frameset can be executed on the Web server concurrently on different threads. 如果每个帧源的 ASP.NET 页面访问会话状态变量，您可以具有多个线程并发访问会话存储区。If the ASP.NET pages for each frame source access session-state variables, then you could have multiple threads accessing the session store concurrently. 若要避免在会话存储区和意外的会话状态行为的数据冲突和类包括为特定的会话的持续时间以独占方式锁定会话存储项的锁定功能ASP.NET 页执行。To avoid data collisions at the session store and unexpected session-state behavior, the and classes include lock functionality that exclusively locks the session store item for a particular session for the duration of the execution of an ASP.NET page. 请注意，即使属性标记为`ReadOnly`，同一应用程序中的其他 ASP.NET 页可能能够写入会话存储区，因此对于只读会话存储中的数据仍可能最终会等待的请求锁定数据释放。Note that even if the attribute is marked as `ReadOnly`, other ASP.NET pages in the same application might be able to write to the session store, so a request for read-only session data from the store might still end up waiting for locked data to be freed. 对会话存储区中调用的请求的开始处的数据设置锁定方法。A lock is set on session-store data at the beginning of the request, in the call to the method. 完成请求后，在调用释放锁方法。When the request completes, the lock is released during the call to the method. 如果对象在调用过程中遇到锁定的会话数据或方法，它将重新请求的会话数据隔半秒之前释放锁或的时间，会话数据已被锁定的值超出了属性。If the object encounters locked session data during the call to either the or the method, it will re-request the session data at half-second intervals until either the lock is released or the amount of time that the session data has been locked exceeds the value of the property. 如果超出执行超时值，则对象将调用方法以释放会话存储数据，在该时间请求会话存储数据。If the execution time out is exceeded, the object will call the method to free the session-store data and request the session-store data at that time. 因为锁定会话存储的数据可能会通过调用释放方法之前调用单独的线程上当前响应的方法，可能会尝试设置和发布具有会话状态存储数据已发布并由另一个会话进行了修改。Because locked session-store data might have been freed by a call to the method on a separate thread before the call to the method for the current response, an attempt could be made to set and release session-state store data that has already been released and modified by another session. 若要避免这种情况下，和方法返回的锁定标识符。To avoid this situation, the and methods return a lock identifier. 此锁标识符必须包含每个请求以修改锁定的会话存储的数据。This lock identifier must be included with each request to modify locked session-store data. 会话存储区修改数据时，仅当数据存储区中的锁定标识符匹配所提供的锁定标识符。Session-store data is modified only if the lock identifier in the data store matches the lock identifier supplied by the . ## 删除过期的会话存储数据Deleting Expired Session Store Data 当方法调用特定会话，则该会话中删除数据从数据存储区使用方法; 否则为，数据将保留在将来的服务器请求的会话数据存储区中的会话。When the method is called for a particular session, the data for that session is deleted from the data store using the method; otherwise, the data will remain in the session data store to server future requests for the session. 这就需要通过实现中删除过期的会话数据。It is up to the implementation to delete expired session data. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例，请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66). 下面的代码示例显示了配置为使用自定义会话状态存储提供程序的 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件。The following code example shows the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application that is configured to use a custom session-state store provider. ``` ```

span.span: ASP.NET Session State Overview

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不需要实现继承的类的构造函数抽象类。You are not required to implement a constructor for a class that inherits the abstract class. 值初始化实现传递到方法的实现。Initialization values for a implementation are passed to the method implementation. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例，请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

span.span: Creates a new object to be used for the current request.
A new for the current request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象调用方法请求的开始处的 ASP.NET 页中，在事件。The object calls the method at the beginning of a request for an ASP.NET page, during the event. 如果调用方法：The method is called if: - 传入请求有任何会话 ID，或the incoming request has no session ID, or - 传入请求的会话 ID 为，但在数据存储区中找不到该会话。the incoming request has a session ID, but the session is not found in the data store. 方法创建一个新具有一个空对象对象，集合，并指定`timeout`值。The method creates a new object with an empty object, an collection, and the specified `timeout` value. 可以使用检索的 ASP.NET 应用程序收集方法。The collection for the ASP.NET application can be retrieved using the method. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例，请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

summary.span: 将新的会话状态项添加到数据存储区中。

span.span: Adds a new session-state item to the data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法与会话一起使用时`cookieless`并`regenerateExpiredSessionId`特性都是`true`。The method is used with sessions when the `cookieless` and `regenerateExpiredSessionId` attributes are both `true`. 无`regenerateExpiredSessionId attribute`设置为`true`会导致对象生成一个新值时过期遇到值。Having the `regenerateExpiredSessionId attribute` set to `true` causes the object to generate a new value when an expired value is encountered. 生成一个新的过程值需要将浏览器重定向到包含新生成的 URL值。The process of generating a new value requires redirecting the browser to a URL that contains the newly generated value. 包含过期的初始请求过程中调用方法值。The method is called during the initial request that contains an expired value. 之后对象获取一个新值来替换过期的值，它将调用方法将未初始化的项添加到会话状态数据存储。After the object acquires a new value to replace the expired value, it calls the method to add an uninitialized entry to the session-state data store. 然后，将浏览器重定向到包含新生成的 URL值。The browser is then redirected to the URL containing the newly generated value. 未初始化的项在会话数据存储区中是否存在可确保重定向的请求，包括新生成值不被误解为请求过期的会话，而，相反，视为新的会话。The existence of the uninitialized entry in the session data store ensures that the redirected request that includes the newly generated value is not mistaken for a request for an expired session and is, instead, treated as a new session. 会话数据存储区中的未初始化的条目是与新生成相关联值，并仅包含默认值，包括到期日期和时间值对应于`actionFlags`参数和方法。The uninitialized entry in the session data store is associated with the newly generated value and contains only default values, including an expiration date and time and a value that corresponds to the `actionFlags` parameter of the and methods. 会话状态存储中未初始化的条目应包含`actionFlags`值等于枚举值。The uninitialized entry in the session-state store should include an `actionFlags` value equal to the enumeration value. 此值传递给对象通过并方法，并通知对象，则当前会话将一个新的但未初始化的会话。This value is passed to the object by the and methods, and informs the object that the current session is a new but uninitialized session. 对象将初始化新的会话并引发`Session_OnStart`事件。The object will then initialize the new session and raise the `Session_OnStart` event. 有关无 cookie 会话的详细信息，请参阅属性。For more information about cookieless sessions, see the property. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例，请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

span.span: ASP.NET Session State Overview

summary.span: 释放由 实现使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时调用方法方法执行的应用程序域关闭。The method is called when the method executes at the closing of the application domain. 继承的类类可以使用此方法以释放不再中使用的任何资源。Classes that inherit the class can use this method to free any resources no longer in use. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例，请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象调用ASP.NET 页中，在请求结束方法期间事件。The object calls the method at the end of a request for an ASP.NET page, during the event. 可以使用方法来执行任何所需的会话状态存储提供程序的每个请求清理。You can use the method to perform any per-request cleanup required by your session-state store provider. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例，请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

span.span: When this method returns, contains one of the values, indicating whether the current session is an uninitialized, cookieless session.

summary.span: 从会话数据存储区中返回只读会话状态数据。

span.span: Returns read-only session-state data from the session data store.

returns.span: 使用会话数据存储区中的会话值和信息填充的 。

span.span: A populated with session values and information from the session data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象调用请求的开始处的方法期间事件，当属性设置为`ReadOnly`。The object calls the method at the beginning of a request, during the event, when the attribute is set to `ReadOnly`. 如果属性设置为`true`，则对象改为调用方法。If the attribute is set to `true`, the object instead calls the method. 方法将返回对象填充有数据存储区中的会话信息和更新会话数据的到期日期。The method returns a object populated with session information from the data store and updates the expiration date of the session data. 如果在数据存储区中，未不找到任何会话项数据方法设置`locked``out`参数`false`，并返回`null`。If no session-item data is found at the data store, the method sets the `locked` `out` parameter to `false` and returns `null`. 这将导致对象调用方法以在数据存储区中创建新的会话项。This causes the object to call the method to create a new session item in the data store. 如果会话项在数据存储区中找到数据但不锁定数据，方法设置`locked``out`参数`true`，设置`lockAge``out`参数为当前日期和时间减去的日期和项已锁定时的时间 （这从存储中检索数据），设置`lockId``out`的锁定标识符的参数将从数据存储和检索返回`null`。If session-item data is found at the data store but the data is locked, the method sets the `locked` `out` parameter to `true`, sets the `lockAge` `out` parameter to the current date and time minus the date and time when the item was locked (which is retrieved from the data store), sets the `lockId` `out` parameter to the lock identifier retrieved from the data store, and returns `null`. 这将导致对象调用后半秒时间间隔尝试检索会话项信息的方法。This causes the object to call the method again after a half-second interval to attempt to retrieve the session-item information. 如果值的`lockAge``out`参数设置超过值，则对象调用方法以清除锁定的会话项数据，然后调用再次方法。If the value that the `lockAge` `out` parameter is set to exceed the value, then the object calls the method to clear the lock on the session-item data, and then calls the method again. `actionFlags`使用参数时同时`cookieless`并`regenerateExpiredSessionId`属性设置为`true`。The `actionFlags` parameter is used when both the `cookieless` and `regenerateExpiredSessionId` attributes are set to `true`. `actionFlags`值设置为指示会话数据存储区中的项是需要初始化的新会话。An `actionFlags` value set to indicates that the entry in the session data store is a new session that requires initialization. 通过调用创建会话数据存储区中的未初始化的条目方法。Uninitialized entries in the session data store are created by a call to the method. 如果会话数据存储区中的项不是一个未初始化的项，`actionFlags`参数将设置为零。If the item from the session data store is not an uninitialized item, the `actionFlags` parameter will be set to zero. 支持无 cookie 会话的自定义会话状态存储实现程序应设置`actionFlags``out`从当前项的会话数据存储区返回的值的参数。Custom session-state store implementers that support cookieless sessions should set the `actionFlags` `out` parameter to the value returned from the session data store for the current item. 如果`actionFlags`项，请求的会话存储的参数值等于枚举值，则方法应将值设置为零后设置数据存储区中`actionFlags``out`参数。If the `actionFlags` parameter value for the requested session-store item equals the enumeration value, then the method should set the value in the data store to zero after setting the `actionFlags` `out` parameter. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例，请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

span.span: ASP.NET Session State Overview

param.name: lockAge
param.span: 当此方法返回时，请包含一个设置为会话数据存储区中的项锁定时间的 对象。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a object that is set to the amount of time that an item in the session data store has been locked.

param.name: lockId
param.span: 当此方法返回时，请包含一个设置为当前请求的锁定标识符的对象。

span.span: When this method returns, contains an object that is set to the lock identifier for the current request.

param.span: 有关锁定标识符的详细信息，请参见 类摘要中的“锁定会话存储区数据”。

span.span: For details on the lock identifier, see "Locking Session-Store Data" in the class summary.

param.name: actions
param.span: 当此方法返回时，请包含 值之一，指示当前会话是否为未初始化的无 Cookie 会话。

span.span: When this method returns, contains one of the values, indicating whether the current session is an uninitialized, cookieless session.

summary.span: 从会话数据存储区中返回只读会话状态数据。

span.span: Returns read-only session-state data from the session data store.

returns.span: 使用会话数据存储区中的会话值和信息填充的 。

span.span: A populated with session values and information from the session data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象调用请求的开始处的方法期间事件，当属性设置为`true`，这是默认设置。The object calls the method at the beginning of a request, during the event, when the attribute is set to `true`, which is the default. 如果属性设置为`ReadOnly`，则对象改为调用方法。If the attribute is set to `ReadOnly`, the object instead calls the method. 方法将返回会话中的信息填充数据存储的对象更新存储的数据的到期日期，并请求的持续期间锁定数据存储区上的会话项数据。The method returns a object populated with session information from the data store, updates the expiration date of the stored data, and locks the session-item data at the data store for the duration of the request. 如果在数据存储区中，未不找到任何会话项数据方法设置`locked``out`参数`false`，并返回`null`。If no session-item data is found at the data store, the method sets the `locked` `out` parameter to `false` and returns `null`. 这将导致对象调用方法以在数据存储区中创建新的会话项。This causes the object to call the method to create a new session item in the data store. 如果会话项在数据存储区中找到数据但不锁定数据，方法设置`locked``out`参数`true`，设置`lockAge``out`参数为当前日期和时间减去的日期和项已锁定时的时间 （这从存储中检索数据），设置`lockId``out`的锁定标识符的参数将从数据存储和检索返回`null`。If session-item data is found at the data store but the data is locked, the method sets the `locked` `out` parameter to `true`, sets the `lockAge` `out` parameter to the current date and time minus the date and time when the item was locked (which is retrieved from the data store), sets the `lockId` `out` parameter to the lock identifier retrieved from the data store, and returns `null`. 这将导致对象调用后半秒时间间隔尝试检索会话项信息并获取数据的锁的方法。This causes the object to call the method again after a half-second interval to attempt to retrieve the session-item information and obtain a lock on the data. 如果值的`lockAge``out`参数设置为超过值，则调用方法以清除锁定的会话项数据，然后调用再次方法。If the value that the `lockAge` `out` parameter is set to exceeds the value, then the calls the method to clear the lock on the session-item data, and then calls the method again. `actionFlags`使用参数时`cookieless`并`regenerateExpiredSessionId`属性均设置为`true`。The `actionFlags` parameter is used when the `cookieless` and `regenerateExpiredSessionId` attributes are both set to `true`. `actionFlags`值设置为指示会话数据存储区中的项是需要初始化的新会话。An `actionFlags` value set to indicates that the entry in the session data store is a new session that requires initialization. 通过调用创建会话数据存储区中的未初始化的条目方法。Uninitialized entries in the session data store are created by a call to the method. 如果会话数据存储区中的项不是一个未初始化的项，`actionFlags`参数将设置为零。If the item from the session data store is not an uninitialized item, the `actionFlags` parameter will be set to zero. 支持无 cookie 会话的自定义会话状态存储实现程序应设置`actionFlags``out`从当前项的会话数据存储区返回的值的参数。Custom session-state store implementers that support cookieless sessions should set the `actionFlags` `out` parameter to the value returned from the session data store for the current item. 如果`actionFlags`项，请求的会话存储的参数值等于枚举值，则方法应将值设置为零后设置数据存储区中`actionFlags``out`参数。If the `actionFlags` parameter value for the requested session-store item equals the enumeration value, then the method should set the value in the data store to zero after setting the `actionFlags` `out` parameter. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例，请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

span.span: ASP.NET Session State Overview

param.name: context
param.span: 当前请求的 。

span.span: The for the current request.

summary.span: 由 对象调用，以便进行每次请求初始化。

span.span: Called by the object for per-request initialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象调用方法，然后再调用任何其他方法。The object calls the method before calling any other method. 可以使用方法以执行任何所需的会话状态存储提供程序的每个请求初始化。You can use the method to perform any per-request initialization required by your session-state store provider. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例，请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

span.span: ASP.NET Session State Overview

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void ReleaseItemExclusive (System.Web.HttpContext context, string id, object lockId);

Public MustOverride Sub ReleaseItemExclusive (context As HttpContext, id As String, lockId As Object)
public: abstract void ReleaseItemExclusive(System::Web::HttpContext ^ context, System::String ^ id, System::Object ^ lockId);
abstract member ReleaseItemExclusive : System.Web.HttpContext * string * obj -> unit

param.name: context
param.span: 当前请求的 。

span.span: The for the current request.

param.name: lockId
param.span: 当前请求的锁定标识符。

span.span: The lock identifier for the current request.

summary.span: 释放对会话数据存储区中项的锁定。

span.span: Releases a lock on an item in the session data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象调用方法来更新的过期日期，并释放会话数据存储区中的项上的锁。The object calls the method to update the expiration date and release a lock on an item in the session data store. 它在结束时调用的请求期间事件，如果会话值保持不变。It is called at the end of a request, during the event, if session values are unchanged. 如果修改了会话值，对象改为调用方法。If session values have been modified, the object instead calls the method. 对象还将调用方法时会话数据存储区中的项上的锁已超出值。The object also calls the method when a lock on an item in the session data store has exceeded the value. 有关锁定的详细信息和有关锁定标识符的详细信息，请参阅"锁定会话存储区数据"中类概述。For more information about locking and details about the lock identifier, see "Locking Session-Store Data" in the class overview. 方法只从当前匹配的应用程序提供的会话的会话数据存储中的项中删除该锁`id`和`lockId`值。The method only removes the lock from an item in the session data store for the current application that matches the supplied session `id` and `lockId` values. 如果`lockId`与数据存储中的一个不匹配方法不执行任何操作。If the `lockId` does not match the one in the data store, the method does nothing. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例，请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

span.span: ASP.NET Session State Overview

summary.span: 删除会话数据存储区中的项数据。

span.span: Deletes item data from the session data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象调用方法在一个请求期间事件，若要从会话数据存储区删除会话项的数据，如果调用方法。The object calls the method at the end of a request, during the event, to delete the data for a session item from the session data store if the method has been called. 仅匹配提供的会话的当前应用程序的会话数据`id`和`lockId`删除值。Only session data for the current application that matches the supplied session `id` and `lockId` values is deleted. 有关锁定的详细信息和有关锁定标识符的详细信息，请参阅"锁定会话存储区数据"中类概述。For more information about locking and details about the lock identifier, see "Locking Session-Store Data" in the class overview. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例，请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

summary.span: 更新会话数据存储区中的项的到期日期和时间。

span.span: Updates the expiration date and time of an item in the session data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象调用方法来更新到当前日期和时间加上该会话的到期日期和时间的会话时值是：The object calls the method to update the expiration date and time for a session to the current date and time plus the session value when either: - 属性是`true`，或the attribute is `true`, or - 请求不会发出和由于出现错误的事件。the request did not raise the and events due to an error. 如果请求 ASP.NET 页和属性设置为`false`，则仍调用方法来更新的到期日期和时间的会话数据存储区中的数据。If an ASP.NET page is requested and the attribute is set to `false`, the method is still called to update the expiration date and time of the data in the session data store. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例，请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

param.span: 如果为 ，则将会话项标识为新项；如果为 ，则将会话项标识为现有的项。

span.span: to identify the session item as a new item; to identify the session item as an existing item.

summary.span: 使用当前请求中的值更新会话状态数据存储区中的会话项信息，并清除对数据的锁定。

span.span: Updates the session-item information in the session-state data store with values from the current request, and clears the lock on the data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象调用方法在一个请求期间事件，以将当前的会话项信息插入到数据存储区或使用当前值更新数据存储区中的现有会话项信息要更新的项的过期时间，才能释放锁的数据。The object calls the method at the end of a request, during the event, to insert current session-item information into the data store or update existing session-item information in the data store with current values, to update the expiration time on the item, and to release the lock on the data. 仅匹配提供的会话的当前应用程序的会话数据`id`和`lockId`更新值。Only session data for the current application that matches the supplied session `id` and `lockId` values is updated. 有关锁定的详细信息，请参阅"锁定会话存储区数据"中类概述。For more information about locking, see "Locking Session Store Data" in the class overview. 如果当前请求的会话值未被修改，不会调用方法。If the session values for the current request have not been modified, the method is not called. 相反，调用方法。Instead, the method is called. 如果已调用方法，不会调用方法。If the method has been called, the method is not called. 相反，对象调用方法来删除数据源中的会话项数据。Instead, the object calls the method to delete session-item data from the data source. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例，请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

span.span: ASP.NET Session State Overview

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract bool SetItemExpireCallback (System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemExpireCallback expireCallback);

Public MustOverride Function SetItemExpireCallback (expireCallback As SessionStateItemExpireCallback) As Boolean

abstract member SetItemExpireCallback : System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemExpireCallback -> bool

param.name: expireCallback
param.span: 对 Global.asax 文件中定义的 事件的 委托。

span.span: The delegate for the event defined in the Global.asax file.

summary.span: 设置对 Global.asax 文件中定义的 事件的 委托的引用。

span.span: Sets a reference to the delegate for the event defined in the Global.asax file.

returns.span: 如果会话状态存储提供程序支持调用 事件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the session-state store provider supports calling the event; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象调用方法来确定在初始化模块时是否调用`Session_OnEnd`支持事件实现并将关联委托，其`Session_OnEnd`事件。The object calls the method when the module is initialized to determine whether calls to the `Session_OnEnd` event are supported by the implementation and to associate the delegate with the `Session_OnEnd` event. 自定义会话状态存储提供程序实施者应使用方法，从而通知对象是否调用`Session_OnEnd`支持事件并将本地引用设置为由提供的委托`expireCallback`参数。Custom session-state store provider implementers should use the method to inform the object whether calls to the `Session_OnEnd` event are supported and to set a local reference to the delegate supplied by the `expireCallback` parameter. 自定义实现必须决定何时本地将调用委托。The custom implementation must decide when the local delegate will be called. 例如，在调用的过程可以调用委托放弃会话时调用的方法。For example, the delegate could be called during the call to the method, which is called when a session is abandoned. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例，请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

span.span: ASP.NET Session State Overview
